column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////Similar wait times as Giordano's. But one big difference
column2: at Giordano's they call out ur name looking for you. And if u don't hear them or miss them
column3: ur screwed. That is what happened to one couple when we got to Giordano's. But at Lou's
column4: they use technology. They get ur number so that when ure next
column5: u get both a call and a text that ur table is ready. Easy for them
column6: easy for me. No need to worry about whether or not u missed ur name being called like that on couple at Giordano's.
